d:
Shadow is your typical stay at home home gamer, who doesn’t like going out all too often. He’s socially awkward and makes a living doing at home coding work, making enough to support his laissez-faire lifestyle as well as house his older sister Lily. Lily is his overbearing explosively social older sister, who’s got a bit of a complex. She’s sporadic and outgoing, a bit of a party girl, but always ready to be with her younger brother. Shadow makes enough money to be able to support her lifestyle and she is trying to find a way to show her appreciation. One fateful weekend night, decisions get made that change the course of their brother sister relationship, and make a positive change for the lives going forward. It’s time they gave into their true feelings.

this comic was commissioned to me by Katson.

More comics on my Patreon: www.patreon.com/lizzardsama
